name: limohalalimatosiratobus
description:
this game is about the limohalalimatosirahfanzoleletobus, the legendary vehicle which is made out of a bit of everything: he is a combination of a limozine, spaceship, airplane, boat, quadcopter, submarine, an a bus. his name is a combination of all of those vehicles' names in Hebrew.

how to play:

get as much points as possible!

kill cops(the RGB beans on the ground) for 30 points each. you can either shoot them or just run over them with your vehicle

follow the green rectangle on the screen to get to the packages, pick them up and drop them at the green circle by right clicking. you can win up to 200 points, depending on how close to the center you dropped it.

keys:

move with WASD

increase speed with scrollwheel up or by pressing i

decrease speed with scrollwheel down or by pressing k

shoot with mouse left click or by pressing j

drop packages with mouse right click or by pressing L

open settings menu and exit game by pressing ESC
